1: ba rnams kyi skye ba'i <mistake>gnas//'grin</mistake> rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las <mistake>skyes</mistake> mchu dang so ni chu dang sa <mistake>dag</mistake> <mistake>go /a</mistake> sogs rnams ni <mistake>gtug</mistake> tor 'khor lo <mistake>snying</mistake> mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i
2: 'khor lo dag la rim pa <mistake>ste//sna</mistake> tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>la'o//rlung</mistake> <mistake>gi</mistake> mtha' nas lhun <mistake>po'</mistake> mtshams su
3: dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la <mistake>na</mistake> <mistake>dpag</mistake> tshad 'bum phrag gnyis // lhun <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>tshod</mistake> ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza'i <mistake>chogs</mistake> kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni <mistake>i</mistake> <mistake>u</mistake> <mistake>lnga //ma</mistake> zin pa'o gdong la <mistake>lng</mistake>
4: bcu <mistake>btan</mistake> pa'i go 'phangs g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid <mistake>du nyi</mistake> <mistake>shu</mistake> <mistake>lnga//de</mistake> yi phyi rol stong <mistake>pa</mistake> gcig <mistake>pu</mistake> srid pa gsum <mistake>pral</mistake> yon tan <mistake>meng</mistake> <mistake>cing de</mistake> nyid kyis dman <mistake>pa'o//rlung</mistake> gi mtha' nas rlung
5: gi mtshams <mistake>dang</mistake> brtan pa 'dzin ma'i bzhi la <mistake>bgling</mistake> dang ri <mistake>dang</mistake> rgya mtsho <mistake>rnams//bzhi</mistake> phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang <mistake>g.ya</mistake> ba'i <mistake>d kyil</mistake> 'khor dbag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag <mistake>gnyis//</mistake>
6: dbus na <mistake>lun</mistake> po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang <mistake>ma tshan</mistake> mor 'khor ba <mistake>ste// cha</mistake> drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi <mistake>sbyor</mistake> ba dag las rab tu
7: <mistake>skyes//'jig</mistake> rten khams kyi kun nas <mistake>'khar</mistake> yug tu ni thad ka'i <mistake>chid</mistake> kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba <mistake>ste //sa</mistake> yi 'khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug <mistake>dgu</mistake> nyi ma
8: rim pas so // mi <mistake>yi</mistake> dbang po phyi rol srid <mistake>pa</mistake> gsum gyi gnas la dpag <mistake>tshad</mistake> 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin <mistake>pa//de</mistake> ni sa yi steng gis gnas su lus la <mistake>ranb</mistake> rang dag gi <mistake>tshod</mistake> kyis yang dag <mistake>khu</mistake>
